comment: A tender amendment is a formal change to the tender, and generally involves the publication of a new tender notice/release.
A list of values in a data structure.

comment_es_EC: En Ecuador el termino licitador puede causar confusión ya que éste es un tipo de procedimiento precontractual de los 38 que existen

comment: Documents sent by the bidder to bid for a contract.
A sum of money dedicated to a specific purpose.
The buyer is the entity whose budget will be used to purchase the goods. This may be different from the procuring entity who may be specified in the tender data.
A system to categorize goods, organizations, services, etc.
OCDS extension that is not developed and maintained by the OCP.
A document that, once agreed and signed by all parties, legally binds them.
http://standard.open-contracting.org/1.1/en/getting_started/contracting_process/
TO BE DELETED, it's too generic. See dedicated terms "core block", "core extension", etc.
A block of data that is part of the core standard, as opposed to blocks introduced by extensions.
OCDS extension that is part of the OCDS standard and maintained by the OCP.
The currency for each amount should always be specified using the uppercase 3-letter currency code from ISO4217.

comment_es_EC: Determinación de los parámetros de calificación y los valores o calificación asignada por cada proveedor dentro de los procedimientos de contratación pública

comment: A string a characters that uniquely identifies an entity.
A tender that is only advertised to a limited number of potential bidders.
Action of matching the members of two lists.
Activity of matching the members of two lists.
A set of OCDS releases or records.
Each of the parties (organizations or other participants) referenced in a release must be included in the parties section.

es_EC: Fases de contratación /Plan Anual de Contrataciones

comment: The entity managing the procurement. This may be different from the buyer who pays for, or uses, the items being procured.

es_EC: Ente rector de la compra pública
comment_es_EC: En el Ecuador se refiere al Servicio Nacional de Contratación Pública

comment: More or less synonym of "documentation".
"A rule or set of rules or requirements which are widely agreed upon or imposed by government." (Wiktionary)

comment_es_EC: El procedimiento precontractual corresponde a la fase de: a) publicación, b) preguntas, respuestas y aclaraciones, c) entrega de ofertas, d) calificación y f) adjudicación. A tender le corresponde los literales a), b), c) y los literales d) y f) corresponden a award

En Ecuador la publicidad y transparencia son principios del Sistema Nacional de Contratación Pública que permiten la mayor concurrencia posible en los procedimientos de contratación pública, hacer un control de gasto público y evitar corrupción

comment: Validation involves a technical check on the way data is structured and formatted. http://standard.open-contracting.org/1.1/en/getting_started/validation/
As opposed to the other types of deliverables that are services and goods.
